atRules.name: import
atRules.description: Tailwind CSS v4 import directive for core styles

parameters.name: tailwindcss
parameters.description: Imports Tailwind CSS v4 core styles

parameters.name: tailwindcss/preflight
parameters.description: Imports Tailwind CSS v4 preflight styles (resets)

parameters.name: tailwindcss/utilities
parameters.description: Imports Tailwind CSS v4 utility classes

atRules.name: apply
atRules.description: Tailwind CSS v4 directive to apply utility classes in custom CSS
